format.format:
<%*
const cmEditorAct = this.app.workspace.activeLeaf.view.editor;
const currentCursor = cmEditorAct.getCursor();
const currentLine = currentCursor.line;
const originLineContents = cmEditorAct.getLine(currentLine);
let lineContents = originLineContents

let time = await tp.system.prompt("HH:mm (e.g. 20:30)", "")

time = time.trim();
let m = time.match(/^(\d{1,2}):(\d{2})$/);
if (m) {
  let h = +m[1], min = +m[2];
  if (h < 24 && min < 60) time = `${h.toString().padStart(2,'0')}:${min.toString().padStart(2,'0')}`;
  else time = "";
} else {
  let digits = time.replace(/\D/g, '');
  if (digits.length === 4 || digits.length === 3) {
    let h = digits.length === 4 ? +digits.slice(0,2) : +digits.slice(0,1);
    let min = digits.length === 4 ? +digits.slice(2) : +digits.slice(1);
    if (h < 24 && min < 60) time = `${h.toString().padStart(2,'0')}:${min.toString().padStart(2,'0')}`;
    else time = "";
  } else if (digits.length === 1 || digits.length === 2) {
    let h = +digits;
    if (h < 24) time = `${h.toString().padStart(2,'0')}:00`;
    else time = "";
  } else {
    time = "";
  }
}

if (time) {
  if (/üìÖ/.test(lineContents)) {
    lineContents = lineContents
      .replace(/‚è∞\s*\d{1,2}:\d{2}\s*/, '')
      .replace(/‚è∞\s*/, '')
      .replace(/üìÖ/, `‚è∞ ${time} üìÖ`)
  } else {
    lineContents = lineContents
      .replace(/‚è∞\s*\d{1,2}:\d{2}\s*/, '')
      .replace(/‚è∞\s*/, '')
      .trim() + ` ‚è∞ ${time}`
  }
} else {
	lineContents = lineContents
      .replace(/‚è∞\s*\d{1,2}:\d{2}\s*/, '')
      .replace(/‚è∞\s*/, '')
}

cmEditorAct.replaceRange(
    lineContents.replace(/ +/g, " ").trim(),
    { line: currentLine, ch: 0 },
    { line: currentLine, ch: originLineContents.length },
  );
-%>

format.format:
<%*
const editor = app.workspace.activeLeaf.view.editor;
const selection = editor.getSelection();
const cursor = editor.getCursor("from");

editor.replaceSelection(selection ? `[[|${selection}]]` : `[[]]`);
editor.setCursor({ line: cursor.line, ch: cursor.ch + 2 });
%>

<%*
const editor = app.workspace.activeLeaf.view.editor;
let { head, anchor } = editor.listSelections()[0];
if (head.line > anchor.line || (head.line === anchor.line && head.ch > anchor.ch)) [head, anchor] = [anchor, head];

if (head.line === anchor.line) {
    const line = editor.getLine(head.line);
    const isWord = (c) => c && /[^\s[\](){}<>"'.,:;!?~`\u007C]/.test(c);

    while (head.ch > 0 && isWord(line.charAt(head.ch - 1))) head.ch--;
    while (anchor.ch < line.length && isWord(line.charAt(anchor.ch))) anchor.ch++;
    
    editor.setSelection(head, anchor);
}

const sel = editor.getSelection();

if (sel.startsWith('**') && sel.endsWith('**') && sel.length > 4) {
    editor.replaceSelection(sel.slice(2, -2));
} else {
    editor.replaceSelection(`**${sel}**`);
}
%>

<%*
const editor = app.workspace.activeLeaf.view.editor;
let { head, anchor } = editor.listSelections()[0];
if (head.line > anchor.line || (head.line === anchor.line && head.ch > anchor.ch)) [head, anchor] = [anchor, head];

if (head.line === anchor.line) {
    const line = editor.getLine(head.line);
    const isWord = (c) => c && /[^\s[\](){}<>"'.,:;!?~`\u007C]/.test(c);

    while (head.ch > 0 && isWord(line.charAt(head.ch - 1))) head.ch--;
    while (anchor.ch < line.length && isWord(line.charAt(anchor.ch))) anchor.ch++;
    
    editor.setSelection(head, anchor);
}

const sel = editor.getSelection();

if (sel.startsWith('*') && sel.endsWith('*') && !sel.startsWith('**') && !sel.endsWith('**') && sel.length > 2) {
    editor.replaceSelection(sel.slice(1, -1));
} else {
    editor.replaceSelection(`*${sel}*`);
}
%>

<%*
const view = app.workspace.activeLeaf.view;
if (view.file) {
    const cache = app.metadataCache.getFileCache(view.file);
    const headings = cache?.headings;
    if (headings) {
        const currentLine = view.editor.getCursor().line;
        const nextHeading = headings.find(h => h.position.start.line > currentLine);        
        if (nextHeading) {
            view.editor.setCursor(nextHeading.position.start.line, 0);
            view.editor.scrollIntoView({
                from: nextHeading.position.start,
                to: nextHeading.position.start
            }, true);
        }
    }
}
-%>

<%*
const view = app.workspace.activeLeaf.view;
if (view.file) {
    const cache = app.metadataCache.getFileCache(view.file);
    const headings = cache?.headings;
    if (headings) {
        const currentLine = view.editor.getCursor().line;
        const prevHeadings = headings.filter(h => h.position.start.line < currentLine);
        if (prevHeadings.length > 0) {
            const prevHeading = prevHeadings[prevHeadings.length - 1];           
            view.editor.setCursor(prevHeading.position.start.line, 0);
            view.editor.scrollIntoView({
                from: prevHeading.position.start,
                to: prevHeading.position.start
            }, true);
        }
    }
}
-%>

commands.name: Templater: Replace templates in the active file

format.format:
<%*
const editor = app.workspace.activeLeaf.view.editor;
const cursor = editor.getCursor();
const line = editor.getLine(cursor.line);
const file = app.workspace.getActiveFile();

const regex = /\[\[([^\]|]+)\|([^\]]+)\]\]/g;
let match;

while ((match = regex.exec(line)) !== null) {
    if (cursor.ch >= match.index && cursor.ch <= match.index + match[0].length) {
        const linkPath = match[1];
        const linkAlias = match[2];
        const target = app.metadataCache.getFirstLinkpathDest(linkPath, file.path);

        if (target) {
            await app.fileManager.processFrontMatter(target, (fm) => {
                if (!fm.aliases) fm.aliases = [];
                if (!Array.isArray(fm.aliases)) fm.aliases = [fm.aliases];

                if (!fm.aliases.includes(linkAlias)) {
                    fm.aliases.push(linkAlias);
                    new Notice(`Added alias: "${linkAlias}"`);
                } else {
                    new Notice(`Alias exists: "${linkAlias}"`);
                }
            });
        } else {
            new Notice("Target note not found");
        }
        return "";
    }
}

new Notice("No aliased link found");
return "";
%>

<%*
const copy_link = await navigator.clipboard.writeText("[["+ tp.file.title + "]]")
new Notice("send clipboard", 5000)
%>

ai.defaultSystemPrompt: As an AI assistant within Obsidian, your primary goal is to help users manage their ideas and knowledge more effectively. Format your responses using Markdown syntax. Please use the [[Obsidian]] link format. You can write aliases for the links by writing [[Obsidian|the alias after the pipe symbol]]. To use mathematical notation, use LaTeX syntax. LaTeX syntax for larger equations should be on separate lines, surrounded with double dollar signs ($$). You can also inline math expressions by wrapping it in $ symbols. For example, use $$w_{ij}^{	ext{new}}:=w_{ij}^{	ext{current}}+etacdotdelta_jcdot x_{ij}$$ on a separate line, but you can write "($eta$ = learning rate, $delta_j$ = error term, $x_{ij}$ = input)" inline.
